QuestData.Title: To Greymane Manor
QuestData.Description: It's time for everyone to head to safety. That includes you, $n. Head to Greymane Manor, the others will be there shortly.$B$BDon't worry about me, I'll make sure that everyone makes it out of here in one piece. Yes, even the few ferals we have in the pens.$B$BOnce you get there, speak to Queen Greymane about the gravity of the situation.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Queen Mia Greymane inside Greymane Manor.
QuestData.RewardText: $n. I've heard much about you.$B$BI understand you were crucial in my family's survival during the outbreak in Gilneas City.
